item.title: Clustering on HELP-International-data
item.description: Content: Preprocessing Finding optimal k clusters Working on subset cluster to find final candidates. 1. Preprocessing The HELP-International-data can be accessed here, where further knowledge of the data can also be acquired. The basic goal of the exercise, is to decide on a number of countries that are to recieve NGO-funding. Given that the NGO has $10 million, my goal with this project is to try and find a tiny subset, ideally 2-3 countries that are most eligible for recieving the funding.
